Text:
Thanks for this upload man, been looking for it for ages! Easy install and clean index with nice manuals!
I will seed this for a few years now haha, pls seed with me guys

Here is a website with info on Heroes, since it's not in-depth in the manual http://masterofmagic.org/
Best 4x game ever. I still remember playing it ~15 years ago. :)
